mapper.select: SELECT no,contenttype,contentid,title,address,image1,hit FROM busantravel WHERE contenttype=#{contenttype} ORDER BY no ASC OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT 12 ROWS ONLY
SELECT no,contentid,contenttype,title,address,image1,hit FROM busantravel WHERE address LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' ORDER BY no ASC OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT 12 ROWS ONLY
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/12.0) FROM busantravel WHERE address LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%'

SELECT no,contentid,title,address,image1,hit,usetime,restdate,parking,rownum FROM (SELECT b.no,b.contentid,title,address,image1,hit,usetime,restdate,parking FROM busantravel b, attraction a WHERE b.contentid = a.contentid ORDER BY hit DESC) WHERE rownum<=4
